judges: Before Bell, O. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
The opinion of President Judge Breene adequately covers the issue in this case.
Judgments affirmed.
Mr. Justice Eagen dissents.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Robert M. Dale, with him J. G. McGill, and Dale and Woodard, for appellants.
casebody.head_matter:
Schreckengost, Appellant, v. Kraft.
Argued October 2, 1964.
Before Bell, O. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
Robert M. Dale, with him J. G. McGill, and Dale and Woodard, for appellants.
Leo M. Brewster, for appellee.
November 10, 1964:
